categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems military bases

nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems operated a listening post on the planet Vanqor. Towards the end of the war, the Jedi Council decided to launch an attack on the listening post. However, the Jedi Master Quinlan Vos, a secret Separatist mole working for Count Dooku, warned the Separatists about the planned attack. As a result, Dooku was able to evacuate the listening post before Jedi and Republic forces arrived.
